  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractOscilloscope
    Base abstract oscilloscope class.
    AbstractSpectrumAnalyzer
    An abstract class that serves as a base class for all spectrum analyzers.
    AbstractVisualization
    Visualization base class.
    FullColorSpectrogram
    Renders a spectrogram covering the full frequency range provided by the FFT.
    FullSpectrogram
    Renders a spectrogram covering the full frequency range provided by the FFT.
    FullSpectrum
    Shows a magnitude vs.
    OscilloscopeLines
    Oscilloscope lines.
    PianoRoll
    Renders a spectrogram displaying 9 octaves of musical notes.
    QuarterColorSpectrogram
    Renders a quarter-spectrogram.
    QuarterSpectrogram
    Renders a quarter-spectrogram.
    QuarterSpectrum
    Shows a magnitude vs.
    SimpleOscilloscope
    Simple oscilloscope.
    SpectrumBars
    Renders a spectrum analyzer.
    Stereograph
    Early high-end high-fidelity audio systems often had a display called a “stereograph”.
    StereoOscilloscope
    Stereo oscilloscope.
    StereoWaveform
    This visualization shows the time-waveform of the input audio signal.
    VisualizationEvent  
    VisualizationPanel  
    VolumeMeter  
    WaterBalloons
    Shows three hanging water balloons bouncing with the music.
    Waveform
    This visualization shows a representation of the time-waveform of the input audio signal.
    WhiteFullSpectrum
    This is a version of the FullSpectrum visualization specifically designed to allow direct comparison between the usual spectrum and a whitened spectrum.
    WhiteQuarterSpectrum
    This is a version of the QuarterSpectrum visualization specifically designed to allow direct comparison between the usual spectrum and a whitened spectrum.
